name: Kudzu The Wilds
description:
This is a prototype for our Serious games assignment. Kudzu The Wilds is a God sim where you as the player have to keep the Eco system balanced so as to make sure your animals survive.

Use the mouse to click on animals and move around the game world. Camera can also move using the WSAD keys.

Credits :

Engineers: Mukul Kakroo, Yuxian Deng

Artists: Miguel Espinosa, Coleman Brcko

Producers: Ben Barker, Corbin White

Designer: Ben Barker
